# android

1. Windows

* ANDROID\_HOME

```
ANDROID_HOME
D:\programtools\android\sdk
```

* CC

```
CC:
D:\programtools\android\sdk\ndk\25.1.8937393\toolchains\llvm\prebuilt\windows-x86_64\bin\clang.exe
```

* GRADLE\_HOME

```
GRADLE_HOME
D:\dev_tools\gradle\gradle-3.3
```

* PATH

```
%ANDROID_HOME%\platform-tools
%ANDROID_HOME%\tools
%GRADLE_HOME%\bin
```
